mapper.sql: select member_id, member_password, name, nickname, birth, sex, zipcode, address, detail_address, email, phone_no, favorite_food, mileage, grade, to_char(to_date(join_date, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') join_date from member
mapper.insert: insert into member (member_id, member_password, name, nickname, birth, sex, zipcode, address, detail_address, email, phone_no, favorite_food, mileage, grade, join_date) values (#{id}, #{password}, #{name},#{nickname},#{birth},#{sex},#{zipcode},#{address},#{detailAddress}, #{email},#{phoneNo},#{favoriteFood},#{mileage},#{grade}, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd'))
mapper.update: update member set nickname=#{nickname}, birth=#{birth}, zipcode=#{zipcode}, address=#{address}, detail_address=#{detailAddress}, email=#{email}, phone_no=#{phoneNo}, mileage=#{mileage} where member_id=#{id}
